entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:16 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
